item.description: Web Usability Web usability refers to how easy it is for users to navigate and interact with a website. It encompasses a range of factors, including the site’s layout, design, functionality, and content. A usable website is one that is easy to use, intuitive, and efficient, and provides a positive user experience. Good web usability can help to increase user engagement, reduce bounce rates, and ultimately drive business success. Text Good web design involves using legible fonts, appropriate font sizes, and appropriate line spacing to make text easy to read.
